ComicInfo.Summary:
“ISLAMOPHOBIA,” Conclusion Double-sized final issue of this second arc comes to a fiery conclusion with a special guest appearance by Dr. David Loren from THINK TANK. THE TITHE WILL RETURN IN JUNE
